deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 38 mins
features: Nano-Ionic Facial Steamer & Humidifier - The Pure Daily Care Nano Steamer is a new type of steamer that generates nano-ionic steam. NanoSteamer does this by combining a conventional heating element with a new ultra sonic vaporizer to produce nano steam with negatively charged ionic particles. Nano steam combined with ionic water particles are up to 10x more effective in penetrating skin.

Professional 5-Piece Skin Kit Included - A Bonus 5 piece stainless steel blackhead and blemish extractor kit is included with every Nanosteamer. This kit includes 5 precise instruments that compliment your Nanosteamer perfectly. Followup your steaming session by using this kit to remove blackheads and blemishes effortlessly for perfect skin after every use.

Genuine 3-in-1 Beauty & Wellness Device - Nanosteamer is a true multifunctional device can also be set to humidify a room and has an extra chamber to warm towels for ultimate refreshment or quick and easy makeup removal.

Full Size Steamer with the Longest Running Time - NanoSteamer is the only full size device with a larger 200ml water tank allows for 30 minutes of working time with a completely silent operation. It also includes an auto shutoff sensor that powers Nanosteamer down when water runs out.
What's in the Box – 1 NanoSteamer Facial Steamer, 5-piece stainless steel skin kit with storage pouch, Power cable, Instruction and support contact manual

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NanoSteamer 3-in-1 Ionic Facial Steamer Bring the spa experience into your home with NanoSteamer. As the first step in a professional facial, steaming softens and hydrates the skin, and helps melt oil, makeup and debris from the complexion. This crucial first step helps to detoxify the skin and prepare it for extractions and skincare.

The NanoSteamer Difference What is Nano Steam? By combining a conventional heating element with an ultrasonic vaporizer, NanoSteamer produces nano steam - negatively charged ionic microdroplets of water, which can penetrate your skin up to 10x deeper than regular steam. Simply fill up the water tank, and turn the dial to use NanoSteamer as a facial steamer, towel warmer, or room humidifier.

Compare NanoSteamers NanoSteamer 3-in-1 Add to Cart NanoSteamer Professional Add to Cart NanoSteamer Clinical Add to Cart NanoSteamer Luxe Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.5 out of 5 stars 41,673 4.4 out of 5 stars 3,911 4.2 out of 5 stars 639 4.3 out of 5 stars 93 Price $39.95$39.95 $59.95$59.95 $69.95$69.95 $49.95$49.95 Hot Steam ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Cold Steam ✘ ✔ ✔ ✔ Towel Warmer ✔ ✘ ✘ ✘ Room Humidifier ✔ ✘ ✘ ✘ Aromatherapy Basket ✘ ✘ ✔ ✔ Built-in Magnifying Mirror ✘ ✔ ✘ ✘ Extraction Toolkit ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Ultimate Skincare Upgrade with a Surprise Bonus!
reviews.reviewText: The NanoSteamer has proven to be the ultimate game-changer in my skincare routine, and it even came with a delightful surprise.Initially purchased as a gift for my sister, the teal-hued wonder turned out to be more than just a facial steamer—it's also a towel warmer! The joy on her face and the rave reviews she shared motivated me to get one for myself.The precise temperature control ensures a spa-quality experience, unclogging pores and banishing blackheads with ease. The Nano Ionic technology takes the facial steaming experience to a whole new level, leaving my skin feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.The bonus 5-piece stainless steel skin kit is the cherry on top, providing the tools needed for a complete skincare routine. It's a thoughtful addition that enhances the overall value of the NanoSteamer.In summary, the NanoSteamer has become an indispensable part of my skincare arsenal. The surprise towel warmer feature, along with its efficacy in promoting healthy skin, makes it a standout product. Five stars for the unexpected delight and the glowing results it brings to my daily routine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for it's value.
reviews.reviewText: My best friend and I try and do a spa day a few times a month and really needed a face steamer. If you read and follow the directions carefully and only used distilled water, you'll have no issues with this machine.It steams incredibly well. It just takes a moment to get going. I reccomend using a thinner towel to throw over the back of your head for the face steamer, the thicker the towel the harder it'll be to breathe. You need some common sense using this, because if your forehead gets the brunt of the steam it'll run into you're eyes with sweat and burn so be sure to wipe off the steam atound your eyes and pull back away from it more. Because I'm tall I had to sit up further to prevent this. I'm surprised how hot it actually gets to the point I have to take breaks to wipe the steam from my eyelids and get some cool air. It makes extractions around the nose, chin, and forehead so much easier and has helped our skin clear up more along with our regular skincare routine.It even works great as a humidifier by my desk. I haven't tried the towel steamer yet but I have no doubt it works great. Even the toolkit provided is durable and gets the job done.I do plan on ordering more of these as gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great hot steam fast
reviews.reviewText: It's easy to figure out and starts putting out hot steam in under a minute. Even though it's designed for more of a spa-day experience, I bought it because I was desperate for some warm steam to clear my sinuses. The facial setting worked great for that. I wish it were more portable, but the cord is long enough for me to be able to sit where I wanted. I'll have to try its other functions soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality and price
reviews.reviewText: Worked very well for a fave steamer. I would not suggest as a humidifier as the water would not last long the steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Had to leave a review
reviews.reviewText: Best moisturizer, and so versatile. I can steam my face, have a hot towel or just breathe in the warm air. And the metal extractor set is great quality. No plastic pieces wrapped around metal, it’s all one piece and can be easily cleaned. I’ve used it every night since I purchased. It surely will remain as part of my nightly routine. I had another face steamer you had to basically sit your face in it. It’s nice to sit back and have some space from the steamer. My skin loves this thing. It leaves my skin so dewey and moist. Love love love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2016
reviews.reviewText: ORIGINAL REVIEW: I purchased this unit after trying a different brand that was constantly breaking. After returning 2 units within 2 weeks, I decided to try a different brand. I found the Pure NanoSteamer to have a superior design (specifically with the water tank) over the pink one with the handle which you see sold under several names here on Amazon. This has much less risk of breaking.This has a good size water tank which allows for a much longer steam than other units. It takes about 1 1/2 minutes for the steam to start, and lasts about 20 minutes. The hand towel steamer takes a about a minute longer, if using a wet towel. I did not think I would use the towel steamer, but once I tried it, I love it and use it every day to remove cleanser.The one small negative is the height. It sits too high to use while sitting at my vanity. The steam goes over my head when sitting. It needs to be on a low coffee table, which isn’t practical for daily use. When standing it hits my neck, but I have to bend to hit the face. The solution for me, whether standing or sitting, is to put a towel over head to capture the steam. This makes it very intense steam! I have to come for air a few times, but it feels great. You need a longer towel for this method, the regular hand towel will put you too close to the steam. You don’t want to get burned, so get something bigger. I found that a 20 x 31” Turkish cotton hand towel works perfectly.Regarding essential oils… I believe most manufacturers are saying not to use essential oils, and yet we all want to use essential oils with our steamers. So the following is my opinion only, based on my experience. This is not any sort of recommendation. Ignoring the manufacturer’s recommendations is something you do at your own risk. But I use 5 drops of eucalyptus oil in my steamer. I’ve been doing this twice daily for over 2 months and have not had any issues. I do clean it every week or 2 with a vinegar/water solution to avoid any buildup of the oils.BTW, I have NOT been compensated for this review. I researched and purchased the item I wanted and paid full price.UPDATE:After nearly a year, my NanoSteamer died. It might sound strange, but I bought the same steamer again to replace it. Even though it only lasted about a year, I used it daily, sometimes twice daily. So I got a lot of use out of it. And for the price, I feel like it was a good deal. I did look around some to see if there was anything new out there which I might like better. But the NanoSteamer had the features I want, and I know that it works great. This time I will not use essential oils in the steamer. That may be the reason it eventually stopped working, I don't know. But I found an even better way to use them, without adding them to the steamer. I put just a drop of eucalyptus oil on a cotton pad and, using tweezers so I don't burn my fingers, I hold the cotton into the steam. I get a lot more of the eucalyptus vapor, using just one drop of oil, than I previously did adding 5 drops to the steamer. I think this is a good solution for those like myself who really want or need to use essential oils.The newer model I received also came with some "free" skin care tools. "Free" in quotes, because the price has actually gone up $10 since the last time I purchased. I would have preferred the lower price and skip the tools I won't use. But I'm still very happy with the NanoSteamer and still feel it is the best option out there, unless you want to spend a few hundred $$ for a professional system.
Works great, steamer is powerful. Smells a little like plastic the first use but goes away. Highly recommend for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Wow just wow 🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩Used several steamers in the past and this one is on point. Did not take long to heat up and is so much better than the enclosed old school ones.Bigger than I thought but it does look pretty 😍Needed to put on bench instead of the table, will probably use piano stool next time as that is the perfect height so I can at least sit down. Using the table I had to stand and I don’t want to do that! You can see the difference between the table, bench and piano stool. Also showing a video of how quick it takes for the steamer to start up.The steam did wonders 🤩 No sides to put my face into, lots of steam comes out, and helped with my cold. I can definitely say I can breathe a lot better, nose and throat cleared so I don't feel clogged up like I did before using it.It’s like being in a steam room but just for your face and neck. I was dripping 🤩 after 10 mins.Checked my smart meter and used 8p (but we also have at least 20 other devices switched on as well including charging a laptop, we are a tech house. Just so you know my unit rates are 29.38p/kwh | standing charge 45.56p/day if this is of any help. Inc. VAT.I only decided to get a newer one after watching the Gadget Show and saw their reviews on several steamers. This wasn’t on the show but the reviews caught my eyes so decided to go with this instead. Over 38K reviews with 4.5 stars, you can’t give this a miss. I used Klarna to make the payment, but the price is also a bargain £39.95 😍 I’ve just got chrimbo out the way, I’m skint already 😂Personally 🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩 is what I’ll post all day long!

Ich kann das Gerät wärmstens empfehlen!Ich benutze es fast täglich und finde meine Haut, insbesondere an der Nase, ist schnell deutlich schöner und glatter geworden.Durch den besonderen Dampf, wie bei der Sauna auch, öffnen sich die Poren und die Mitesser ploppen fast schon von alleine raus! Praktisch ist auch, dass ein Set an Pickelentfernern mitgeliefert wird. Damit kann man im Anschluss direkt die Mitesser entfernen.Erstaunlich was da alles in kurzer Zeit rauskommt!Eine Tankfüllung dauert ca. 15 Minuten. Aber auch weniger Zeit reicht bereits aus, um die Haut danach zu reinigen.Danach fühlt sich die Haut weich und angenehm an.Hinzu finde ich das Benutzen als angenehm, wohltuend und erfrischend.Als Wasser verwende ich gekauftes Wasser, da Leitungswasser Kalk enthält und das Gerät beschädigen kann. Dies steht auch in der Gebrauchsanweisung.An sich sieht das Gerät farblich gut und schön aus. Ich kann verschiedene Modi bei der Benutzung einstellen.Alles in allem finde ich das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis auch top! Für knapp 40€ kann man da echt nichts falsch machen. Das Produkt hält was es verspricht! Es ist nützlich, tut gut und hat keine Nebenwirkungen auf der Haut, wie bei Cremes etc. Der Dampf dringt tief in die Haut ein und mit dem Set kann man alles leicht ausdrücken.Der Hersteller hat sich hier gründlich Gedanken gemacht und ein ordentliches Set entwickelt! Ich würde es jederzeit wieder kaufen!
puedo sacar los puntos negros sin maltratar mi piel y queda super tersa.
